original_text: Sometimes people insulted you. They made you ashamed in front of other people. Sometimes you chose to help other Christians who had trouble like that. Their troubles became your troubles. Sometimes people insulted you. They made you ashamed in front of other people. Sometimes you chose to help other Christians who had trouble like that. Their troubles became your troubles. Sometimes people insulted you. They made you ashamed in front of other people. Sometimes you chose to help other Christians who had trouble like that. Their troubles became your troubles.
korean_text: 혹은 비방과 환난으로써 사람에게 구경거리가 되고 혹은 이런 형편에 있는 자들과 사귀는 자가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: They made you ashamed in front of other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들 앞에서 당신을 부끄럽게 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Sometimes you chose to help other Christians.
sentences.korean_translation: 때로는 당신이 다른 그리스도인들을 돕기로 선택했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They made you ashamed in front of other people.
